org.seadva.ingest

Interface SeadSipStager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.dataconservancy.dcs.ingest.SipStager

    public interface SeadSipStager
extends org.dataconservancy.dcs.ingest.SipStager
    Provides access to SIPs throughout an ingest process.

    Durably or semi-durably persists sips from ingest start through ingest finish. It is intended that staged sips are removed after they are no longer necessary (i.e. an ingest has completed)

      • updateSIP

        void updateSIP(org.seadva.model.pack.ResearchObject sip,
             String id)
        Persist changes to a sip.

        Staged sip content will be replaced by the given Dcp sip.

        Parameters:
        sip - Dcp package containing the current state of the sip.
        id - Sip identifier.

      • removeSIP

        void removeSIP(String id)
        Remove a sip from the stager.

        Requests that a staged sip be immediately removed from the stager. It is intended to be used for exceptional conditions such as ingest failure.

        Specified by:
        removeSIP in interface org.dataconservancy.dcs.ingest.SipStager
        Parameters:
        id - Sip identifier.

      • retire

        void retire(String id)
        Indicate that an ingest has completed, and the Sip is no longer necessary.

        When invoked, the stager will free staged sip resources at its convenience, or according to a policy.

        Specified by:
        retire in interface org.dataconservancy.dcs.ingest.SipStager
        Parameters:
        id - Sip identifier.
